title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 4 August 2025 through Monday, 11 August 2025ğŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +8, -0

Support increases (8)

API

  1. api â Element â scrollIntoView â options_container_parameter
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  2. api â RTCRtpSender â setParameters â parameters_encodings_parameter â codec
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver â bidi â network â addDataCollector
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver â bidi â network â removeDataCollector
    Added to Firefox  â  2 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver â bidi â emulation â setTimezoneOverride
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  4. webdriver â bidi â emulation â setTimezoneOverride â contexts_parameter
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  5. webdriver â bidi â emulation â setTimezoneOverride â timezone_parameter
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines
  6. webdriver â bidi â emulation â setTimezoneOverride â userContexts_parameter
    Added to Chrome  â  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 113

Show all 113 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (54)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Saturday, 2 August 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

HTML

  1. html â global_attributes â hidden â until-found
    Backfilled for Safari  â  3 of 3 engines

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key.
